fault_codes.troubleshooting_steps: Check gas supply. Check ignition electrode and lead. Check flue for blockages. Reset boiler.
fault_codes.safety_warning: Ensure gas supply is turned off before checking gas components.

fault_codes.troubleshooting_steps: Check flame sensing electrode. Check gas valve. Check flue for blockages.
fault_codes.safety_warning: Ensure gas supply is turned off before checking gas components.

fault_codes.troubleshooting_steps: Check pump operation. Check for blockages in system. Check overheat thermostat.
fault_codes.safety_warning: Allow the system to cool before handling components.

fault_codes.troubleshooting_steps: Check system pressure. Check pump operation. Check flow sensor.
Check flue for blockages. Check air pressure switch. Check fan operation.
fault_codes.safety_warning: Ensure flue system is properly installed to prevent carbon monoxide poisoning.

fault_codes.troubleshooting_steps: Check flow NTC sensor. Check wiring. Check PCB connections.
fault_codes.safety_warning: Disconnect power before checking electrical components.

fault_codes.troubleshooting_steps: Check return NTC sensor. Check wiring. Check PCB connections.
fault_codes.safety_warning: Disconnect power before checking electrical components.

fault_codes.troubleshooting_steps: Check DHW NTC sensor. Check wiring. Check PCB connections.
fault_codes.safety_warning: Disconnect power before checking electrical components.

fault_codes.troubleshooting_steps: Reset boiler. If fault persists, replace PCB.
Check system pressure. Re-pressurize system. Check for leaks. Check pressure sensor.
Check gas valve connections. Check PCB. Possibly replace gas valve.
fault_codes.safety_warning: Ensure gas supply is turned off before checking gas components.

fault_codes.troubleshooting_steps: Check electrical supply to boiler. Check for fluctuating supply.
fault_codes.safety_warning: Electrical issues should be addressed by a qualified electrician.
